meanings.sent2: She tends to misspell names on birthday cards.
meanings.sent3: It can be funny when people misspell simple words.
meanings.sent4: Trying to write quickly, I often misspell words in my notes.
meanings.sent5: Remember to double-check your work to avoid any misspelling mistakes.

meanings.sent4: The misspell address led us to the wrong house.
